pages.text: $(li)The Spring Launcher is a member of the $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/piston)Piston$(/l) family.$(br)$(li)When it is activated and an item, creature, any entity or you are on the top of it, it will push up it several blocks away.
$(li)If a creature or you fall into an Spring Launcher that is receiving Redstone Signal, it will be thrown up away too.
